page.title: 07 Foxcombe Hall - Boars Hill
page.content:
The open university is a major provider of courses and other forms of study material. It provides graduate courses in almost all subjects, using television and radio as well as providing study packs consisting of audio and visual cassettes, books etc. Foxcombe Hall, Boars Hill is the headquarters of the southern region of the Open University, covering the area Berkshire, Buckinghamshire,Channel Islands,Dorset, Hampshire, Isle of Wight and Oxfordshire.
Foxcombe Hall was formerly known as Rippon Hall and was an Anglican Theological College.
